structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Practice Of Podiatry; Holding Out As A Registered Podiatrist
law.text: No person shall practice or attempt to practice podiatry in the commonwealth, or hold himself out as a podiatrist, or designate himself, or describe his occupation, by the use of any words or letters calculated to lead others to believe that he is a registered podiatrist, unless he is registered as provided in section sixteen.
